title._content: Image taken from page 360 of 'The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe ... With twelve illustrations by Thomas Stothard, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Life and Adventures of Robinson Crusoe ... With twelve illustrations by Thomas Stothard, etc", "Major Single Works. Robinson Crusoe. Parts I, II" Author: Defoe, Daniel Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12604.i.9." Page: 360 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: John Hogg Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000892276 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
